price: Na huwalisha chakula, juu ya kukipenda kwake, masikini, na yatima, na wafungwa.
arabic: وَيُطۡعِمُونَ ٱلطَّعَامَ عَلَىٰ حُبِّهِۦ مِسۡكِينٗا وَيَتِيمٗا وَأَسِيرًا
footnotes: Na huwalisha chakula mafakiri wasio weza kazi, na watoto walio fiwa na wazee wao, na wafungwa wasio miliki kitu, ijapo kuwa wao wenyewe hao watoaji wanakipenda hicho wanacho kitoa, na wanakihitajia.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wayuṭ'ʿimūna al-ṭaʿāma ʿalā ḥubbihi mis'kīnan wayatīman wa-asīran
